trans-unit.source: Frees a memory block in the internal library heap

seg-source.mrk: Frees a memory block in the internal library heap

target.mrk: Frees a memory block in the internal library heap

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the valid memory block to be freed.

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to the valid memory block to be freed.

target.mrk: A pointer to the valid memory block to be freed.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_FreeMemory() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description).
